Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MainController extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the main controller It receives messages from the server, reads them and responds to them after checks executed by all the controllers

    • messageFromServer

      public void messageFromServer(it.polimi.ingsw.network.Messages.Message message)
      It receives a message from the server, who previously received it from the client
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the server. The message is related to a particular client

    • loginToTheGame

      public void loginToTheGame(String nickname, it.polimi.ingsw.View.VirtualView virtualView)
      Method invoked by the server to handle the login to the game when a new player enters the game (when the numPlayers is not exceeded) If it's the first player we also have to ask him the number of players and if he wants to play with the experts variant The choice of the seed of the assistant cards is asked to every player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the client's nickname
      virtualView - the virtual view associated to the client

    • broadcastingMessage

      public void broadcastingMessage(String message)
      To send a textual generic message to all the clients connected to the server
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent to everybody

    • broadcastingDisconnection

      public void broadcastingDisconnection(String nickName, String message)
      Disconnects the players connected to the server from the match
      Parameters:
      nickName - player's name in the match
      message - the message of disconnection

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      When you have to check if the game has already started
      Returns:
      true if the game is ongoing, false if not

    • removeVirtualView

      public void removeVirtualView(String nickname)
      to remove a virtual view from this controller, because of a disconnection
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player removed

    • endedGame

      public void endedGame()
      deletes the current game if ended
